post.body: Still waiting for my third, indeed. I dreamed last night that it kicked, but it hasn't, not yet, not really. Am I eager!
I'm not sure I like girls better, it seems equal this far. I've no idea how the balance will tilt. How do you take their advice?
Oh dear, eight children? You must be a hero! I still can't imagine life with three, oldest in school, youngest in cradle.
She should go, as long as it's not his place. Unless she wants that ;)
Don's always been amazing, and he's also become human since apologizing. It's almost like a fresh start for us, pregnancy included.
Sweet of you! I've called Clara in to be honest, I'm still in moody waters and wasn't going to spoil my mood further, or the food.
I wouldn't worry. Whatever happens, Don will fix it. He said as much.
Good morning to you, too :) I'm in a good mood today. Strange, no? Pregnancies are so, I'm being remembered every other minute.
That's a good idea, dressage.
Wine me and dine me? That's sweet, but Don is very much in town, and very much in love with me these days.
You mean Madman Muntz? What has he got to do with us? True, Don used to sell cars, like Muntz, but long ago, before we met.
I didn't know I was pregnant. The news numbed me for a while. I haven't given up riding yet, but jumping... I had to let go.
You could say that my third child was a surprise, as well. Hoping it will turn a blessing, too, like yours did.
I'm not worried about the holidays. Cooking I do daily, and the Christmas gifts? I mostly buy them throughout the year.
I'm having the third child because I have no option. Also because we're trying to do the right thing, @don_draper and I.
Smoking causing me to wrinkle faster around the mouth? Funny! Maybe drinking, too? Would wrinkles on my eyes be better, if I cried?
I'd be delighted :)
I believe there wasn't any doubt ;)
Better even, it was fun! As a beautiful girl and then woman, I learned to not take competitions too seriously ;)
I nominate @betty_draper for a Shorty Award in #entertainment for being a sweet, glamorous wife & mother. Though not humble ;)
You can imagine: among husband, two children, a third unborn, morning nausea and Christmas preparations, little time is left.
It's quite something, indeed, to be recognized as entertaining by Don. Nominate myself, you think? Sounds like a funny idea.
I nominate @peggyolson for a Shorty Award in #advertising for her outstanding work during @don_draper's leave in California.
No worries, she's been around for a while now. I've learned to live with a... shadow.
Now, don't make a pregnant woman blush ;)
Thank you, dear. I missed being here, among all my many new friends. The worst has passed, though, so I'm back to stay :)
You are right, a reminder that all is OK never hurts. Neither does going past the first awful months. This must be my last child.
That's a very good way to look at my 'dream', thank you. Maybe my baby really kicks while sleeping and dreaming, sweet thing.
My child to be David who?
launched an interesting idea today: inviting the creative department of Sterling Cooper for a well-done party at ours. Pondering
Why, thank you, that is almost as sweet as a nomination ;)
I nominate @betty_draper for a Shorty Award in #food because thousands of people love her recipes & advices, tips & tricks :)
Very glad you enjoyed it. I'm afraid I enjoyed it too much, I keep saying 'do consider' ;) Not every day one has a #madparty
I'm afraid I can't wait for @don_draper this time. I hope you are right, and I hope he's alright. Good night! #madparty
Thank you for ALL your help, dear :) Good luck with the Shorty Award, and do consider my NYE advice. #madparty
A pleasure to meet you. Do consider taking the train. And enjoy your holidays with friends! #madparty
Maybe you and @ken_cosgrove can give @_PeteCampbell a ride home? Cabs would be a fortune, and he looks so shaken. #madparty
As soon as I know.
Thank you for the magazine and the picture! I haven't had such fun in a while, you're a great team. Drive safely! #madparty
You're welcome :) And certainly, you can have the recipe, but will you remind me tomorrow, please? The #madparty has drained me...
@harrycrane It was great seeing you and I really enjoyed the brandy. I wish @don_draper was here, and we'd join you. #madparty
They've been great so far, except @don_draper's gone missing. I hope it is the snow. #madparty
I hope I will find out about @don_draper tomorrow. I'm so tired, all of a sudden. I did wake up awfully early. #madparty
Let's just make sure everyone has a ride or a drink, whichever they like :) Ethel will come tomorrow morning to clean. #madparty
I believe they were good. I had none. Last time I checked the buffet, the food was gone. Carla can hardly believe it. #madparty
So kind of you to have helped us look glamorous for eternity. I hope my worry didn't come through... Do have a brandy. #madparty
I'm sorry it's been such a short #madparty for the two of you.
Fruitcake, definitely :) Although on the sofa, for me. Carla! Please help @bertramcooper, will you!
You're too kind. It's normal for a wife to worry, I'm afraid :( The baby seems to have liked the #madparty, it kicks. Dear me!
OK, I admit it, I didn't even know that there was a glitch, or that it was called 'glitch'. Don opened my eyes, and then fixed it. Perfect!
Something went wrong today. Apologies, friends, I've no idea where the glitch came from or what triggered it. I'm just happy I fixed it :)
No @michaelpleahy I certainly promote no show, though I sometimes speak of my favorite shows. You could say I promote the Drapers, though :)
You're funny @Justin1383 with your 'bad example'. Sally smoking? A bit early, maybe, but other than burning the house down, I see no problem
Weeks fly by. The novelty? A recurring dream that my baby kicks. Of course it doesn't kick. It's too early. I wonder what the dream means...
Great, I can nominate someone myself, that's so elegant! I think it has to be @peggyolson for her work while @don_draper was in California.
Why, @don_draper is sweet! He nominated me @shortyawards in #entertainment http://tinyurl.com/6mafl5 I am terribly excited!
Baking an apple crumble my way. That is honey instead of sugar, chopped walnuts among the crumbles, and a generous amount of cinnamon. Mmmm!
This was fun! And so different from other contests. Now I have a nomination in #egocentric, too. I wonder why ;)
The best part yet? You can nominate anyone, in as many categories as you like, until the clock strikes midnight on December 31st. Have fun!
Or, of course, the other one, and remember to replace your name http://tinyurl.com/5bgzaj
You can nominate me easier than making a call like mine: replace your name http://tinyurl.com/672cc8
Not finding me as entertaining as Don and his guests do? I know just the thing: don't put all eggs in the same basket. So let's diversify...
The baby woke me up, asking for a lot of water. And there was @don_draper sleeping next to me as if nothing happened. My husband is strange.
Heading to bed, though I could sleep on the sofa. So tired. The Sterling Cooper crowd parties fast and intense! Don was right, a #madparty.
Thank you, Carla, and sorry, this has really been a #madparty. You must go home now. I only hope the snow isn't slowing down the trains.
